alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hardeman, south central Madison and west central Chester Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chickasaw State Forest. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Chickasaw State Park, Chickasaw State Forest, Silerton, Cloverport, Toone, Medon, Deanburg, Teague, Pine Top and Shandy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
